summary: Use this API to get the item information of an order
description: Use this API to get the item information of an order.

query.name: order_id
query.description: The identifier that was assigned to the order by the Seller Center.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/order/items/get','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("order_id", "31202")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/order/items/get','GET')
request.add_api_param('order_id', '31202')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.description: The specified order ID is not valid.

The order number in the request does not exist in the current store, please call GetOrders API to synchronize the order list first, or call GetSeller API to check if you are using the access token of the corresponding store.
